General.Name: Comtrend Corp
General.Description: Comtrend Corporation designs, manufactures, and sells broadband communication equipment worldwide. The company provides cable and wireless transmission equipment, multiplexers, digital subscriber lines and loop carrier systems, synchronous optical network equipment, and synchronous cable accessories. It also offers extenders, wall and ceiling access points, routers and switches, G.hn powerline and coax adapters, ethernet over coax, PoE devices, surveillance, and various wireless options. The company was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: 10 Lane 609, Chongxin Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 241405
